1.question: What is the name of the city where I was born? (Does not include its parent name)
What is the full name of the hospital where I was born?
What was the time of my birth? (for example, at 13:31)
What are my parents' full names? (Separated by commas)
What is the full name of my first child?

2.question: What is the full name of the teacher who left the deepest impression on you during your elementary school days?
What is the full name of the most impressive teacher in junior high school?
What is the full name of the most impressive teacher in high school?
What is the full name of the most impressive teacher in college?
What is the full name of the closest classmate in primary school?
What is the full name of the most closely related students in junior high school?
What is the full name of your closest classmate in high school?
What is the full name of the classmate who is closest to you in college?
What is the full name of the first classmate you know when you just entered junior high school?
What was the full name of the first classmate you met when you first entered high school?
What was the full name of the first classmate you met when you first entered the university?
What is the full name of the first teacher who taught me when I first entered primary school?
What is the full name of the first teacher who gave me a class when I first entered junior high school?
What was the full name of the first teacher who taught me when I first entered high school?
What was the full name of the first teacher who taught me when I first entered college?
